title: Cinderella Undressed
description: A wicked twist to a classic tale! Instead of a fairy godmother, Cinderella is taken under the wing of an aging brothel owner named Hestia who advises her not to go for the dashing and beloved Prince of the land, but to aim a little higher and go for the king himself. Sick and tired of being mistreated by her stepmother and stepsisters she agrees to try and seduce the infamously aloof king Xavier.
author: Mila Scott
